full_summary:
**Tender Notice: Nutanix Acropolis (AOS) Ultimate Software License & Production Software Support Service**
==================================

**Tender Reference:** SSC-23-00024867:T
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Publication Date:** December 20, 2023

**Description:**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to provide Nutanix Acropolis (AOS) Ultimate Software License & Production Software Support Service. The proposed service is required to support the security and functional requirements of SSC's IT infrastructure.

**Key Requirements:**

* Security requirement: No security requirements are specified in this solicitation.
* Trade Agreements: The successful bid must comply with World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Timeline:**

* Final closing date for a submission of proposal: January 12, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST).

**Submission Inquiries:**
 Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca).

**Access to Solicitation:**
 The BPM solicitation can be accessed through the P2P portal: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public. Select solicitation list: BPM020344.

Note: Please ensure to carefully review the terms and conditions of the solicitation before submitting a proposal. The supplier is responsible for ensuring compliance with all applicable legislation and regulations.
